response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a significant value of $800,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the effort put into its creation. Considering its exceptional attributes, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to you to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to own something truly remarkable. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a valued owner of this exceptional piece.", "product_price": 750000}
